lego: what I was hoping would happen
practice_phrases: What I was hoping would happen.
我希望会发生的事。
That wasn't what I was hoping would happen.

She was very kind when she asked what I was hoping would happen.
当她问我希望会发生的事时，她非常友好。
I couldn't answer what I was hoping would happen earlier.
我不能回答之前我希望会发生的事。
That wasn't the same thing as what I was hoping would happen.
那和我希望会发生的事不是同一件事。
He wasn't very patient when I tried to fix what I was hoping would happen.
当我试图修理我希望会发生的事时，他不是很耐心。
I was grateful when you helped me understand what I was hoping would happen.

That wasn't what I was hoping would happen.
